snippet: At a time when Republicans are divided on many social issues, the budget wars are one of the few things that unite them.
abstract: Editorial criticizes House Republicans for setting up endless series of fiscal crises in order to avoid other issues on which they are divided; notes that variety of insidious new budget proposals are emerging from House that must be vigorously opposed.
lead_paragraph: At a time when Republicans are divided on many social issues, the budget wars are one of the few things that unite them.

headline.seo: From One Budget Fight to the Next
headline.main: From One Budget Fight to the Next
headline.print_headline: From One Budget Fight to the Next
